info: Support splitting arrays into individual messages.
label: [split] array split

template:

    {
        "id": "9e7ccc97f80d9afb",
        "type": "tab",
        "label": "[file in] will accept file name from msg obj",
        "disabled": false,
        "info": "A file name can also be dynamic and be taken from the msg object passed to the file in node.",
